snippet: Documents released by the U.S. government show it views an executive order issued in 1981 as the basis of most of the National Security Agency's surveillance activities, the American Civil Liberties Union said on Monday....

headline.print_headline: New Documents Show Legal Basis for NSA Surveillance Programs
headline.main: New Documents Show Legal Basis for NSA Surveillance Programs

lead_paragraph: Documents released by the U.S. government show it views an executive order issued in 1981 as the basis of most of the National Security Agency's surveillance activities, the American Civil Liberties Union said on Monday.
